law.text: ________________________________________ FOOTNOTE(S): ________________________________________ --- (6) --- Editor's note— Ord. No. 2007-235, §1, adopted May 15, 2007, effective July 2, 2007, repealed the former Art. E, §§8-2161—8-2175, and enacted a new Art. F as set out herein. The former Art. F pertained to water conservation and derived from Ord. No. 2004-713, §1, adopted Sept. 21, 2004. (Back)
